title: Nawaloka Care introduces ‘Premier Centre’: a premium health center in the heart of Col 07
body_lines: In a concerted effort to meet the needs of patients nationwide, Sri Lanka’s most trusted private healthcare provider Nawaloka Care introduced a state-of-the-art, premium health and wellness center on 1st March, 2022. Located in the affluent neighborhood of Colombo 07, this facility will cater to the discerning customer, offering the ultimate in luxury and personalized healthcare in the comfort and privacy of a deluxe setting accented by plush, modern interiors.

“We are thrilled to launch the Premier Center by Nawaloka Care to better cater to the rapidly evolving healthcare needs of discerning Sri Lankan. As a pioneer in the private healthcare sector, Nawaloka has always envisioned to provide Sri Lankans of all demographics access to world-class integrated healthcare delivery system, powered by the finest medical skills combined with passionate patient care. Getting our patients the care they need to stay healthy has always been our top priority, and this center is the ultimate culmination of the hard work, and thought invested by a team passionate about delivering excellent patient outcomes. We look forward to further expanding the scope of the services offered at Premier Center to make it a one-stop shop for world class healthcare solutions in the months to come,” Nawaloka Care Managing Director, Harshith Dharmadasa remarked.

Premier Center by Nawaloka Care is fully geared to offer a broad scope of diagnostic and wellness solutions aided by a team of well-regarded consultants and highly-trained, experienced nursing staff. The centre houses OPD consultation and channeling services with that can be booked with convenience and utmost privacy, along with a fully-functional laboratory and drive-thru lab for ECG’s, X-rays, ultra sound scans, Echo cardiograms, PCRs, health checkups, among a 360 portfolio of essential solutions. All appointments will be on a pre-booked basis, and restricted to a particular number of appointments per day, per consultant to guarantee minimum waiting time and avoid hassle.

Additionally Premier Centre offers a pharmacy, a world-class fitness centre that offers physiotherapy, fitness training programmes such as yoga and Zumba, and safe, high quality healthcare solutions for fat burning using PRP. Patients can also benefit from on-premise eye consultation facilities, elderly care services and family planning services.
